details: Example Job Posting Details Company: Innovative Systems Inc. Job Description: We are looking for a Full-Stack Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will: Build scalable web applications using Node.js and React. Implement RESTful APIs and integrate with third-party services. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features. Have experience with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure. Skills in Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD are a plus. Preferred Qualifications: 2+ years of experience in full-stack development. Proficiency in JavaScript, Node.js, and React. Strong understanding of Agile development methodologies.
